name: Zapier
0:
”Alexa, open Zapier”
”Alexa, ask Zapier to trigger a zap”
”Alexa, ask Zapier to update my status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zapier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
When you connect Amazon Alexa to Zapier, you can use your voice to make things happen in thousands of apps you use every day. Use Zapier to connect Amazon Alexa to over 2,000 apps including messaging platforms, lead generation tools, CRMs, project management apps, and marketing automation platforms.

In under 10 minutes, you can build an automated workflow in Zapier that will let you use your Amazon Alexa device to manage information in other apps. 

With Zapier, you can ask Amazon Alexa to post a message in Slack, create a lead in your CRM, add a task to your to-do list, automatically send an email to your team, and more.
 
The Zapier skill is compatible with all devices (Alexa app on phone or tablet, or one of the Alexa devices (Dot, Hub, etc)).
